questiontext.text: 1. A woman aged 25 years came to Dental Center with complaints of a cavity on upper right posterior tooth that usually has food impaction. Under clinical examination, tooth 17 showed caries with category D5, S2, S3. The cavity would be restored withan onlay porcelain. What is an ideal luting cement used for insertion the onlay?

2. A man aged 35 years old, came to RSGM with complaints of a cavity on lower right posterior tooth. The cavity has been previously restored 3 months ago. Intra oral examination showed a cavity with category D5, S2, S3. Treatment planning was onlay class II. The preparation is made divergence 2-5 degree towards occlusal. What is the purpose of this preparation?

3. A man aged 35 years old, came to RSGM with complaints of a cavity at upper anterior tooth. The patient wished his tooth be restored with tooth-colored restoration. Cleaning of tooth surface is important to get the color of the tooth. What is the right material used for that purpose?

4. A man aged 35 years old, came to RSGM with complaints of a cavity at upper anterior tooth. The patient wished his tooth be restored with tooth-colored restoration. When is appropriate to determine the tooth color ?

5. A man aged 45 years old, came to RSGM with complaints of a cavity at upper anterior tooth. Clinical examination showed caries on facial proximal surface of tooth 21 that has not occupied incisal and palatal with category D4,S2,S2. What is the right preparation design for that case?

6. A man aged 45 years old, came to RSGM with complaints of a cavity at upper anterior tooth. Clinical examination showed caries on facial proximal surface of tooth 21 that has not occupied incisal and palatal with category D4,S2,S2. Where is the initial preparation for that case ?

7. A woman aged 25 years came to Dental Center with complaints of a cavity on upper right posterior tooth. Clinical examination showed caries on distal proximal surface of tooth 16 with category D5,S2,S2. What is the configuration/ C factor for this case ?

8. A woman aged 25 years came to Dental Center with complaints of a cavity on upper right posterior tooth. Clinical examination showed caries with thin pulpal floor on tooth 16 with category D5,S1,S2. What type of base is used to protect the pulp for this case?

9. A woman aged 25 years came to Dental Center with complaints of a cavity on lower left posterior tooth. Clinical examination showed caries at occlusal surface of tooth 36 with category D5,S1,S2. The cavity will be restored with composite resin. What type of composite resin matched to this case ?

10. A woman aged 29 years came to Dental Center with complaints of a cavity on lower left posterior tooth. Clinical examination showed caries at occlusal surface of tooth 36 with category D5,S1,S2. Configuration factor (C factor)is important to be considered when composite resin is the material of restoration. What is affected by C factor of the mentioned below ?

11. A woman aged 29 years came to Dental Center with complaints of a cavity on lower left posterior tooth. Clinical examination showed caries at mesio-occlusal surface of tooth 36 with category D4,S2,S2. The cavity will be restored with universal composite resin. What is the application technique used to apply the composit resin into the cavity ?

12. A woman aged 32 years came to Dental Center with complaints of a cavity on lower left posterior tooth. Clinical examination showed caries at occlusal surface of tooth 36 with category D5,S1,S2. The cavity will be restored with composite resin using bonding self etch adhesive system. What is the advantage of using the bonding system for this case?

13. A teenager aged 16 years came to RSGM with complaints of food debris retention on his posterior teeth. Clinical examination showed no caries but deep fissures on teeth 36, 46. What is the appropriate material for those cases ?

14. A man aged 58 years came to RSGM Unhas with complaints of his left cheek of usually having stomatitis. Clinical examination showed non caries cavity lesion at tooth 24 and 25 with sharp margin and lesion category D4, S3, S2. What is the right type of composite resin chosen to restore these cases?

15. A man aged 62 years referred to RSGM Unhas for final restoration following root canal treatment of lower right posterior tooth. Clinical examination showed temporary restoration with category site 1,size 4 on tooth 46, and attrition on the occlusal surface. What is the reason to choose metal onlay for the above case ?

16. A teenager aged 16 years came to RSGM with complaints of a gap between central incisors. Clinical examination showed caries at interproximal of tooth 11 and tooth 21 with category D4, S2, S2, and also at tooth 22. GIC is chosen to restore the cases. What type of bonding between GIC and tooth structure?

17. A man aged 34 years old, came to RSGM with complaints of upper anterior tooth. Clinical examination showed caries at mesio-incisal of tooth 21 with category D4,S2,S2. The tooth will be restored with composite resin and total etch bonding system. What is the reason to avoid excessive dessication during water rinsing?

18. A woman aged 29 years came to Dental Center with complaints of a cavity on lower right posterior tooth. Intraoral examination showed caries at proximal surface of tooth 46 with category D5,S2,S2. What is the purpose to place matrix band prior to restoration?

answer.text: To prevent the fracture of restoration

questiontext.text: 19. A man aged 34 years old, came to RSGM with complaints of a cavity on upper anterior tooth. Clinical examination showed a cavity on the cervical area of tooth 13 with category D4,S3,S2, which has involved part of the root. Where is the bevel provided during preparation ?
20. As a standard procedure of good practice, sterilization is of utmost important step. What type of an ideal sterilizator for the instruments used in dental practice ?

21. A man aged 26 years old, came to RSGM with complaints of a cavity on upper anterior tooth. Clinical examination showed a cavity in distal part that has reached incisal area with category D4,S2,S2. The cavity was restored with composite resin, universal color. Which type of the composite resin used ?

22. A man aged 45 years old, came to RSGM with complaints of his discolored filling of anterior teeth. It appeared brownish color. The man is used to drink coffee. What is the cause to these color change?

23. A man aged 48 years old, came to RSGM with complaints of the gap of his two upper anterior teeth. Intra oral examination showed caries lesion at interproximal of teeth that had reached incisal edge with criteria D4, S2, S2. Why GICs are not the right choice as restorative material for the cases?

24. A man aged 29 years came to Dental Center with complaints of a cavity on lower right posterior tooth. Intraoral examination showed caries at occlusal surface of tooth 46 with category D5,S1,S2. The cavity will be restored with high strength composite resin. What does the strength of composite resin relate to?

25. A man aged 49 years old came to Dental Center with complaints of pain while eating on lower right posterior tooth. Intra oral examination showed caries at occlusal surface of tooth 46 with category D5,S2,S3. The cavity will be restored with metal inlay Class II. What type of luting cement used for final cementation of the inlay?

26. A woman aged 26 years old, came to RSGM with complaints of her discolored dentition. The patient is used to consume carbonated beverages and tea. Intra oral examination showed yellowish dentition. Why Home bleaching is not indicated for this case?

answer.text: The result depends on the patients obedience

questiontext.text: 27. A man aged 36 years old, came to RSGM with complaints of his discolored dentition. The patient is used to consume carbonated beverages and tea. Intra oral examination showed yellowish dentition. What is the cause of yellowish color of these teeth?

28. A man aged 26 years old, came to RSGM with complaints of his discolored dentition. The patient is used to consume carbonated beverages and tea. Intra oral examination showed yellowish dentition. What type of bleaching was indicated for the patient?

29. A man aged 21 years old, came to RSGM with complaints of line on his upper and lower teeth. The patient had history of antibiotic consumption when he was 3 years old. Intra oral examination showed greyish yellow color dentition. The dentition is planned to have bleaching. What is the right choice of bleaching agent used?

30. A man aged 35 years old, came to RSGM with complaints of a cavity on his upper anterior tooth. The tooth has just been restored 4 months ago. Clinical examination showed a cavity on the mesial of tooth 11 with category D4,S2,S2 that has reached incisal area. On evaluation, the occlusion is deep bite. What treatment is appropriate to the patient ?

31. A man aged 35 years old, came to RSGM with complaints of a cavity on his upper anterior tooth. Clinical examination showed a cavity on the mesial of tooth 12 with category D4,S2,S2 that has reached incisal. What is the purpose of beveling at CSM ?

32. A man aged 38 years old, came to RSGM with complaints of a cavity on his upper anterior tooth. Clinical examination showed a cavity on the mesial of tooth 12 with category D4,S2,S2 that has reached incisal. Total etch adhesive system was chosen for bonding system. Where was etching applied?

33. A man aged 59 years old came to Dental Center with complaints of lost of filling on lower right posterior tooth. Intraoral examination showed a cavity at tooth 46 with category D5,S2,S3. The cavity will be restored with inlay class II. What type of material suitable for the case ?

34. A man aged 38 years old, came to RSGM with complaints of a cavity on his upper anterior tooth. Clinical examination showed a cavity on the mesial of tooth 12 with category D4,S2,S2 that has reached incisal. Total etch adhesive system was chosen as bonding system for the restoration. What is the etching usually used ?

35. A man aged 38 years old, came to RSGM with complaints of a cavity on his upper anterior tooth. Clinical examination showed a cavity on the mesial of tooth 12 with category D4,S2,S2 that has reached incisal. Total etch adhesive system was chosen as bonding system for the restoration. What is affected by the application of etching on tooth structure?

answer.text: dissolution of organic component of dentinal tubules
dissolution of inorganic component of peritubular dentin
dissolution of organic component of enamel
dissolution of component of dentinal debris
dissolution of inorganic component of smear layer

questiontext.text: 36. A woman aged 28 years old, came to RSGM with complaints of her upper anterior tooth. Clinical examination showed a cavity on mesial of tooth 21 with category D4,S2,S2, that has not reached incisal. Restoration is performed using total etch bonding system. What is the purpose of etching ?

37. A man aged 35 years old, came to RSGM with complaints of his left upper posterior tooth. Clinical examination showed a cavity on tooth 26 with category D4,S1,S2. What bur is used for finishing of the restoration ?

38. A man aged 35 years old, came to RSGM with complaints of his left upper posterior tooth. Clinical examination showed a cavity on tooth 26 with category D4,S1,S2. What should be done in order to achieve retention of restored composite resin?

answer.text: flat pulpal floor, convergence of vertical wall 2-5º to occlusal
flat pulpal floor, shallow vertical wall
flat pulpal floor, divergence of vertical wall 2-5º to occlusal
flat pulpal floor, pependicular vertical wall
flat pulpal floor, flat vertical wall

questiontext.text: 39. A woman aged 35 years old, came to RSGM with complaints a cavity of her left lower posterior tooth. Clinical examination showed a cavity on tooth 34 with category D5,S2,S2. The tooth has been restored twice, and came out. The dentist decided indirect restoration. What is the suitable material for the case?

40. A man aged 21 years old, came to RSGM with complaints of line on his upper and lower teeth. The patient had history of antibiotic consumption when he was 3 years old. Intra oral examination showed greyish yellow color dentition. The dentition is planned to have bleaching. What is the reason to choose high concentration of bleaching agent used?

41. A man aged 35 years old, came to RSGM with complaints of sharpness edge on his left lower posterior tooth. Clinical examination showed Class II tooth-colored restoration on tooth 36 and there was gap in lingual area between tooth structure and restoration. According to the patient, the tooth has been restored 6 years ago. What category is the caries ?

42. A man aged 58 years referred to RSGM Unhas for final restoration following root canal treatment of lower right posterior tooth. Clinical examination showed temporary restoration with category site 1, size 4 on tooth 46, and attrition on the occlusal surface. What is the treatment plan for the above case ?

43. A labor man aged 47 years came to dental hospital with complaints of pain on his brownish anterior teeth when drinking cold water. Intra oral examination showed caries on tooth 14,13,12,11,21,22,23,24 with category D4, S3, S2. The patient is used to smoking and drinking coffee. What is the material of choice for this man?

44. A man aged 47 years came to dental hospital with complaints of pain on his side lower teeth when gargling with water following brushing his teeth. Intra oral examination showed sauce-shaped lesion on tooth 34,35 with category D4, S3, S2. The man is used to unappropriately brush his teeth. What type of this lesion?

45. A man aged 17 years came to dental hospital with complaints of blackish image on his anterior tooth. Intra oral examination showed a shallow lesion on tooth 22 with category D3, S2, S1. What type of restorative material chosen for the case ?

46. A labor man aged 47 years came to dental hospital with complaints of pain on his brownish anterior teeth when drinking cold water. Intra oral examination showed caries on tooth 14,13,12,11,21,22,23,24 with category D4, S3, S2. The patient is used to smoking and drinking coffee. The cavity surface should be treated prior to the application of GIC. What material is it?

47. A labor man aged 47 years came to dental hospital with complaints of pain on his brownish anterior teeth when drinking cold water. Intra oral examination showed caries on tooth 14,13,12,11,21,22,23,24 with category D4, S3, S2. The patient is used to smoking and drinking coffee. What should be applied to the cavity after restoration with GIC?

48. A man aged 17 years came to dental hospital with complaints of blackish image on his anterior tooth. Intra oral examination showed a shallow lesion on tooth 22 with category D3, S2, S1. What type of preparation design chosen for the case ?

49. A man aged 17 years came to dental hospital with complaints of blackish image on his anterior tooth. Intra oral examination showed a shallow lesion on tooth 22 with category D3, S2, S1. What is the reason when GIC was chosen for the case ?

50. A woman aged 35 years old, came to RSGM with complaint of pain when drinking cold water. Clinical examination showed concavities on palatal side of upper anterior teeth. This patient had history of GERG. What type of these lesion?

51. A woman aged 26 years old, came to RSGM with complaints of her discolored dentition. The patient is used to consume carbonated beverages and tea. Intra oral examination showed yellowish dentition. What is the indication that this case can be treated with extracoronal bleaching using carbamide peroxide 15%?

52. A woman aged 29 years came to Dental Center with complaints of a cavity on lower right posterior tooth. Intraoral examination showed caries at proximal surface of tooth 46 with category D5,S2,S2. What should be done prior to application of composite resin?

answer.text: Placement of mylar strip and wedge
Placement of sectional matrix, wedge and matrix holder
Placement of celluloid strip and wedge

questiontext.text: 53. A woman aged 39 years came to Dental Center with complaints of a cavity on lower right posterior tooth. Intraoral examination showed caries at occlusal surface of tooth 46 with category D5,S1,S2. Prior to application of composite resin, the cavity should be disinfected. What is applied to the cavity for disinfection?

54. A woman aged 45 years came to Dental Center with complaints of pain on lower right posterior tooth. Intraoral examination showed caries at cervical area of tooth 45 with category D5,S3,S2. What bonding system is suitable for this case ?

55. A man aged 53 years old, came to RSGM with complaints of a cavity on lower left posterior tooth. The cavity has been previously restored 3 months ago. Intra oral examination showed a cavity with category D5, S2, S3. Treatment planning was onlay class II. What should be done to achieve an even reduction of occlusal surface ?

56. A woman aged 43 years old, came to RSGM with complaints ofa cavity on lower left posterior tooth. The cavity has been previously restored 3 months ago. Intra oral examination showed a cavity with category D5, S1, S3. Treatment planning was onlay composite class I. What is appropriate for the preparation of vertical wall?

answer.text: flat pulpal floor, and divergence of vertical wall 5-10ºto occlusal
flat pulpal floor, and divergence of vertical wall 2-5º to occlusal
flat pulpal floor, and vertical wall perpendicular to pulpal floor
flat pulpal floor, and convergence of vertical wall 2-5º to occlusal
flat pulpal floor, and convergence of vertical wall 5-10ºto occlusal

questiontext.text: 57. A man aged 53 years old, came to RSGM with complaints of a cavity on lower left posterior tooth. The cavity has been previously restored 3 months ago. Intra oral examination showed a cavity with category D5, S2, S3. Treatment planning was onlay class II. What is excluded from assessment during try-in of onlay?

answer.text: margins on facial and lingual surface

questiontext.text: 58. A woman aged 45 years came to Dental Center with complaints of a cavity on lower right posterior tooth. Intraoral examination showed caries close to the root at tooth 44 with category D5,S3,S2. Composite resin is the restorative material chosen. What type is the preparation design ?

59. A man aged 53 years old, came to RSGM with complaints of a cavity on lower left posterior tooth. The cavity has been previously restored 3 months ago. Intra oral examination showed a cavity with category D5, S2, S3. Treatment planning was onlay class II. What is used to assess the occlusal surface during try-in of onlay?

60. A woman aged 43 years old, came to RSGM with complaints of a cavity on lower left posterior tooth. The cavity has been previously restored 2 times. Intra oral examination showed a cavity at tooth 34 with category D5, S2, S2. Treatment planning was inlay composite class lI. What is the reason to choose indirect restoration for the case?
